ModInfo.Name: xce (ZH)
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
Chinese (Traditional) Translation
for Xenonauts Community Edition v0.34.1
Draft version.
Should be placed above most mods, but below Khall's More Portraits.
Included mods:
* Armoured Assault * Extended Weapon Descriptions for Fighters * Geographic addition 1.1 * Lore+ * X:CE Balance Adjustment
